=======
CHANGES
=======

3.5.0 (2008-06-19)
------------------

- Separate subscriber configuration into a separate ZCML file.


3.4.1 (2007-10-31)
------------------

- Resolve ``ZopeSecurityPolicy`` deprecation warning.


3.4.0 (2007-10-24)
------------------

- Initial release independent of the main Zope tree.
